summary: This document is an internal email forwarding a Reuters news article about the U.S. Department of Justice opening a professional misconduct probe into the handling of the Jeffrey Epstein case. It appears to be communication within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: DOJ Announces Professional Misconduct Probe in Epstein Case
events.description: The U.S. Department of Justice announces it is conducting a professional misconduct investigation into the handling of the Jeffrey Epstein case.

keyFacts: The U.S. Department of Justice initiated a professional misconduct probe related to the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The probe was announced on or before February 6, 2019.
The communication originates from or is directed to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
